title.en: JCB 435S Stage IV And V DK edit

description.en:
JCB 435S Agri Tier4-Final 2018 and Tier5 2019.
The JCB Wheelloader 435S is made for maximum productivity in farming operations. The 435S only comes with high quality components like Cummins-Engine, ZF-Transmission and -Axles and Rexroth-Pumps for best power to weight ratio as well as excellent longevity. Also its very safely, easy to maintain and with Eco-Mode as well as automatic neutral-circuit most fuel-efficient.
Price: 184.000$ Power: Stage IV: 172kw/235hp Stage V: 185kw/252hp Diesel: 400l DEF: 40l
